alert.note: Alert for Eastern Will; Grundy; Kendall; La Salle; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 9:31AM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow, slippery travel, and strong northwesterly winds expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and northwesterly wind gusts of 45 mph expected, both primarily this evening. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Illinois. * WHEN...Until noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will transition to rain this afternoon before transitioning back to snow this evening. The next period of impactful weather conditions is expected this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
